articles.author: Ted Barrett and Ali Zaslav, CNN
articles.title: Senate confirms Lisa Cook to be the first Black woman on Fed board - CNN
articles.description: The Senate on Tuesday confirmed Lisa Cook to the Federal Reserve Board of Governors, becoming the first African American woman to be a member of the panel.

articles.author: TSN.ca Staff
articles.title: Roughriders sign six-time CFL All-Star Hughes - TSN
articles.description: The Saskatchewan Roughriders have signed American defensive lineman Charleston Hughes, the team announced on Tuesday. Hughes, 38, returns to the Roughriders for his 14th CFL season after spending the 2021 campaign with the Toronto Argonauts.
articles.content:
The Saskatchewan Roughriders have signed American defensive lineman Charleston Hughes, the team announced on Tuesday.

articles.description: Rapper Young Thug won a Grammy in 2019 for song 'This is America'

articles.title: Is COVID endemic? What experts say Americans should expect this summer - USA TODAY
articles.description: The past two summers saw increased cases, hospitalizations and death, but health experts say this summer may be different.
